channel.title: FreePromptHub - AI Art & Design Prompts
channel.description: Latest AI Art & Design AI prompts from FreePromptHub

item.title: Logo Designer - AI Art | FreePromptHub
item.description: Design professional logos with AI. Create memorable, scalable logos that work everywhere from business cards to billboards. No design experience needed.

item.title: Product Mockup Generator - AI Art | FreePromptHub
item.description: Create professional product mockups with AI. Generate studio-quality product shots, lifestyle images, and marketing visuals without expensive photography.

item.title: Social Media Image Pack - AI Art | FreePromptHub
item.description: Create consistent social media visuals with AI. Generate Instagram posts, stories, YouTube thumbnails, and complete brand packages that stop the scroll.

item.title: Consistent Character Creator - AI Art | FreePromptHub
item.description: AI prompt for creating consistent characters across multiple images in Midjourney, DALL-E, or Stable Diffusion. Perfect for stories, brands, or content series.

item.title: Brand Style Guide Creator - AI Art | FreePromptHub
item.description: Create a complete brand visual identity with AI. Generate logos, color palettes, patterns, and style guides that establish a professional, cohesive brand.
